name: Roboquelike
description:
This Game was made in the GlobalGameJam 2020.

You are a robot stranded in a heavily guarded but damaged facility. Your only escape: A broken cylindrical elevator. To repair your means of escape, you need to destroy the countless security bots and gather their wrenches. Good luck! 

Controls: 

UpWDownSLeftARightDShootLeft Mouse ButtonInteract/ Use / RepairE Main MenuEscape
